name: Latex Basic
description:
Latex Basic is a MusicVideoGame created in collaboration with Izaac Wilson. The game sets the player in a neon night in Tokyo travelling through different districts on their journey home. The game empowers the player to put colour in their world where they see fit. For optimal player experience download the standalone version or enjoy the in built WebGL Demo. 

Created by

Audio - Izaac Wilson - https://soundcloud.com/co_sign

Game Designer - Tristan Shaw - https://twitter.com/TJKShaw

Game Designer - Joshua Bidwell - https://twitter.com/joshuaabidwell

Game Designer - Paul Frame - https://twitter.com/PaulCFrame
